DOC.brief_summary: Open-label immunogenicity, safety and efficacy study of etanercept manufactured using the high capacity process. Descriptive results will be provided however a formal hypothesis will not be tested in this trial.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Immunogenicity, Safety, and Efficacy of High Capacity Process Etanercept in Rheumatoid Arthritis Subjects
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe active disease with presence of at least 4 tender joints and 4 swollen joints. Either the patient or a designee must be capable of administering the subcutaneous injection of study drug. Prior treatment with etanercept. Presence of active infection or active or untreated tuberculosis.
